entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm north of Bay Roberts. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 3. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
